WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 07.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V PXGEO 2 TOWING TEN 8100 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   37-26.90S 053-53.00W, 37-49.80S 054-10.50W,
   38-15.70S 053-15.80W, 37-52.70S 052-58.60W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 515/24.
